text:
#Chloroquine & #Hydroxychloroquine to treat COVID-19? Both drugs can affect vision. Risk of vision loss is higher w/ chloroquine than with hydroxychloroquine. Risk is greater at higher & prolonged doses. 
#ophthalmology @CDCgov @aao_ophth @uiowaeye @JeromeAdamsMD @EyeQDoctor https://t.co/f49ktZkgeb
